name: Do not Disturb!
description:
Developed in 48hrs in April 2021.

It's the night. Granny is very tired. You will not let this stop you from gaming, will you?

 Get all the noisemakers out of the house to enjoy your sweet video games while granny goes DEEPER AND DEEPER into sleep.

Grab the items making noise (also glowing red) and throw them off the 2nd-floor balcony so they can not disturb dear granny. If she wakes up, you will not be able to play games and will LOSE.

CONTROLS:

  • W A S D - Moving
  • Left shift - Sprint
  • E - Open doors
  • Right mouse button - Grab items
  • ESC - Quit game

Made by:

  • Oskar Unt
  • Tarmo Unt
  • Siim Püvi
  • Marten Jalakas

Unfortunately, we didn’t have time to implement a restart button. Sorry! Just quit and re-launch.
